citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12 pm on
05-Dec-16.
Arrived at 12pm, 12-05-16. Knock on doors of home and trailer. Tried the phone number numerous times.
Recording stated, "number no longer in service." Waited 30 plus minutes.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

Recording stated, "number no longer in service."  Waited 30 plus minutes.
